price: ߕߊ߰ߛߌ߬ߟߌ߫ ߟߴߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߘߋ߬ ، ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߝߊ߲߬ߓߊ ߟߋ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߟߊߒߠߦߊߓߊ߯ ߘߌ߫
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
